name: Beamlink: Photon Connect
description:
A 2D Puzzlegame with Lasers created on a weekend for the Extra Credits GameJam 4.
Try to arrange everything to get the lights on with the least ammount of moves possible.
Move objects around and avoid obstacles to win the level.
After you finish a level, it will be available in the Level Selection to play it again.

Controlls:

Use the arrows on the objects to move them, if they have the rotate icon you can use it to rotate them. Press [R] to reload the level.

Known bugs:

Sometimes the Arrows from an object disapear. If you can, rotate the object, otherwise you'll have to reset the Level with [R]
Some mirrors dont reflect the light when it comes from an object that is not supposed to be the solution here.
All levels are playable, if you think a bug is preventing you from finishing a level, you are probably on the wrong way. Try something else or reset the level if necessary.
